TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SqlExecutionException extends System.SystemException
Public NotInheritable Class SqlExecutionException Inherits SystemException
public ref class SqlExecutionException sealed : SystemException

Docs.summary: Defines a class for SQL execution exceptions in the namespace.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class is provided as a means to differentiate SQL execution exceptions from other application exceptions.
## Examples The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.Management.SqlExecutionException> exception type. This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.Management.SqlServices> class.
